objects.text: 925 Sterling Silver | Rose Gold Finish | Perfect Gift

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a soft pink radial-gradient background embellished with a delicate gold linear gradient overlay and fine ornamental borders, creating an elegant vintage atmosphere. A product image is centered within a muted circular glow, drawing focus to the item. The composition includes a large, bold serif title ("heading") at the top in an earthy brown shade, followed by a romantic subheading ("tagline") in soft rose. Product specifications ("description") are succinctly displayed mid-bottom in a clean, bold font. Beneath it, the price text ("price") is styled prominently in the same rose hue. A rounded rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta") anchors the design.

**Color Palette**  
- #FFD1DC (Light Pink)  
- #FFF0F5 (Lavender Blush)  
- #8B4513 (Saddle Brown)  
- #C76D7E (Rose Pink)  
- #FFFFFF (White)  
- #E0A899 (Peach Beige)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings with a soft and luxurious color palette. Predominantly, the jewelry features **rose gold** (#F7B6AB) as the primary metal color, which creates a warm and feminine base. The **light blush pink** (#FADADD) teardrop elements add softness and charm, while the **clear sparkling crystals** reflect shades of **icy white** (#FFFFFF) and **light silver** (#DDE2E6), providing contrast and brilliance. These colors blend naturally, with the metallic rose gold seamlessly enhancing the soft pink and crystal tones. The overall palette is romantic and elegant—perfect for a banner that highlights sophistication and grace.
